generated_code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>Python Code Writing Animation</title>
  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.6.0/p5.js"></script>
  <style>
    body {
      margin: 0;
      display: flex;
      justify-content: center;
      align-items: center;
      background-color: #2e3440;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <script>
    let pythonCode = [
      "def greet(name):",
      "    print(f'Hello, {name}!')",
      "",
      "greet('World')"
    ]; // Array of Python code lines
    let currentLine = 0; // Tracks which line is being 'written'
    let currentChar = 0; // Tracks which character is being 'written' in the current line
    let writtenText = ""; // The text already 'written'
    let typeSpeed = 100; // Speed of typing in milliseconds
    let startTime; // Timestamp to control animation duration

    function setup() {
      createCanvas(800, 400); // Canvas size
      textFont('Courier New'); // Use a monospaced font
      textSize(24); // Font size
      fill(255); // Text color
      noCursor(); // Hide mouse cursor
      startTime = millis(); // Record start time
    }

    function draw() {
      background(46, 52, 64); // Background color

      // Display the 'written' Python code
      text(writtenText, 50, 50);

      // Stop the animation after 15 seconds
      if (millis() - startTime > 15000) {
        noLoop(); // Stop the draw loop
        return;
      }

      // Add characters to the code one by one over time
      if (frameCount % Math.round(typeSpeed / 16.67) === 0) { // Adjust typing speed
        if (currentLine < pythonCode.length) {
          let line = pythonCode[currentLine];
          if (currentChar < line.length) {
            writtenText += line[currentChar]; // Add the next character
            currentChar++; // Move to the next character
          } else {
            writtenText += "\n"; // Add a newline when the line is complete
            currentLine++; // Move to the next line
            currentChar = 0; // Reset character index
          }
        }
      }

      // Draw a blinking cursor
      let cursorX = textWidth(writtenText.split("\n").pop()); // Get the cursor's horizontal position
      let cursorY = 50 + 30 * currentLine; // Calculate the cursor's vertical position
      if (frameCount % 30 < 15) { // Blink the cursor on/off
        text("|", 50 + cursorX, cursorY);
      }
    }
  </script>
</body>
</html>
